thread.title: BRIEF-Las Vegas Sands Says CEO Sheldon Adelson's FY 2017 Total Compensation Was $26.1 Mln

title: BRIEF-Las Vegas Sands Says CEO Sheldon Adelson's FY 2017 Total Compensation Was $26.1 Mln
text:
April 20, 2018 / 8:29 PM / in 13 minutes BRIEF-Las Vegas Sands Says CEO Sheldon Adelson's FY 2017 Total Compensation Was $26.1 Mln Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 20 (Reuters) - Las Vegas Sands Corp: 
* LAS VEGAS SANDS SAYS CEO SHELDON ADELSONâ€™S FY 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $26.1 MILLION WHICH INCLUDED $12.5 MILLION IN NON-EQUITY INCENTIVE PLAN COMPENSATION 
* LAS VEGAS SANDS SAYS CEO SHELDON ADELSON'S FY 2016 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $12.7 MILLION - SEC FILING Source : bit.ly/2JfiV58 Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
